mapper.select: select id, title, logo from blog where id=#{blogId}
mapper.update: update blog set title=#{title }, logo=#{logo } where id=#{id }
update blog set title=#{title } where id=#{blogId }
mapper.select: select c.no as no, c.name as name, c.desc as description, c.blog_id as blog_id, ifnull((b.cnt) , '0') as postCounts from category c left join (select category_no ,count(*) as cnt from post group by category_no) b on c.no = b.category_no where c.blog_id = #{blogId }
select name from category where blog_id= #{blogId }
mapper.insert: insert into post(no, title, contents, reg_date, category_no) select null, #{title }, #{contents }, now(), no from category where name=#{categoryName } and blog_id=#{blogId }
